Installation¶

Source code manner¶

Using git:

git clone https://github.com/SitaoZ/featurExtract.git
cd featurExtract
python setup.py install

pip¶

Or pip:

pip install featurExtract

featurExtract is tested with Python 3.8

Optional requirements¶

  • python >= 3.7.6 python

  • pandas >= 1.2.4 pandas

  • gffutils >= 0.10.1 gffutils

  • setuptools >= 49.2.0 setuptools

  • BioPython >= 1.78 biopython

Install them all with conda:

conda install --channel conda-forge --channel python pandas gffutils setuptools biopython
